text: The Iron Giant is a 1999 science fiction action fantasy animated film produced by Warner Bros. Itâ€™s based on a book by Ted Hughes. == Cast == * Vin Diesel as The Iron Giant * Eli Marienthal as Hogarth Hughes * M. Emmet Walsh as Earl Stutz * Christopher McDonald as Kent Mansley * John Mahoney as General Rogard * James Gammon as Marv Loach/Floyd Turbeaux/General Sudokoff * Harry Connick, Jr. as Dean McCoppin * Jennifer Aniston as Annie Hughes * Cloris Leachman as Miss Tensedge * Joan Cusack as Charlotte Pickles * Frank Thomas as himself * Ollie Johnston as himself * Jack Angel, Bob Bergen, Rodger Bumpass, Robert Clotworthy, Jim Cummings, Paul Eiding, Bill Farmer, Pat Fry, Rick Miller, Patrick Pinney, Phil Proctor, Brian Tochi and Hans Zimmer as Soldiers * Marcel Jeannin as Councilman * Hans Zimmer as Helmsman * Jim Cummings as Boat Captain * Patrick Pinney as Fisherman * Carole Jeghers as Maine woman #3 and squirrel * Stephen Ouimette as Soldier * David L. Lander as Hunter == Possible sequel == On July 2017, Warner Animation Group announced that development for the sequel to the film titled The Iron Giant Christmas Carol. Charles Dickens will based on A Christmas Carol novel. Following that month, Diesel and Aniston will reprise the roles of The Iron Giant and Annie Hughes. ==Segments== * The giant robots are both segment films such as The Luke Movie and Logan and Luke.
